tool.name: SAGA.docs_pdf.1
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArraySHAPES False isArrayFIELD False isArrayOUTPUTPATH False output_data_TABLE $output_data_TABLE name SAGA.docs_pdf.1 SHAPES $SHAPES FIELD $FIELD PDF $PDF OUTPUTPATH $OUTPUTPATH prefer $prefer response $response outputType_TABLE $OutputSection_TABLE.outputType_TABLE transmissionMode_TABLE $OutputSection_TABLE.transmissionMode_TABLE

param.name: SHAPES
param.label: Shapes
param.help: Shapes The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, json

param.name: FIELD
param.label: Field
param.help: Field The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: OUTPUTPATH
param.label: Folder
param.help: Folder The following data types are allowed in the txt file: plain

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_TABLE
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value
